name: Terry
description:
Terry has devoted his life to the study of paranormal phenomena and metaphysics. During his thoroughly scholarly research he came upon a mysterious Artifact which has occupied his time ever since.

After carefully choosing a test subject, a painter named Amelí who died under mysterious circumstances, he began experimenting with The Artifact.

Gameplay

Our story begins on a fateful night in mid august. Terry has just woken up from a thunderstorm raging outside.

Continue Terry's research, look for clues, familiarize yourself with his apartment and his predicament.

Controls

  • Movement: WASD
  • Mouse: Free look
  • E or Left-click: Interact
  • J: Open Journal (once you have it)

Credits

Developer: Robin Toller Hovler

3D & 2D artist: Edvin Edenhage

Music and sound: Robin Toller Hovler

Assets we did not make:

Paintings: Evelyn De Morgan (Painting titles: City Of Light, Hope In The Prison Of Despair, Night And Sleep, The Field Of The Slain, The Love Potion)

Royalty-free sounds used: Freesound.org (Breaking Window, Breaking Bottle, Head Punch, Footsteps)
